TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault.synopsis: The goblins are commenting on the player attacking or killing Liam when they've already gotten information about the grove.

TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_0.speaker: GROUP_Goblins
TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_0.text: The kidneys! He'll scream if you hit him in the kidneys!
TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_0.context: NodeContext: They are cheering the player on - they don't need the prisoner anymore and want to see him die in the most horrible way possible.

TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_1.speaker: GROUP_Goblins
TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_1.text: Hells, he's leakin' blood all over. Make sure he doesn't die too quickly.
TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_1.context: NodeContext: They are cheering the player on - they don't need the prisoner anymore and want to see him die in the most horrible way possible.

TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_2.speaker: GROUP_Goblins
TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_2.text: Oh, the thievin' prisoner finally kicked it? Hope ya didn't go easy on him.
TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_2.context: NodeContext: light-hearted. You killed their prisoner, but they don't mind, they didn't need him anymore.

TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_3.speaker: GROUP_Goblins
TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_3.text: Couldn't keep yer hands off the prisoner, could ya? Better hope Spike didn't see.
TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_3.context: NodeContext: light-hearted. You killed their prisoner, but they don't mind, they didn't need him anymore.

TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_4.speaker: GROUP_Goblins
TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_4.text: Aim for his head! Heard it bleeds real nice.
TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_4.context: NodeContext: They are cheering the player on - they don't need the prisoner anymore and want to see him die in the most horrible way possible.

TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_5.speaker: GROUP_Goblins
TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_5.text: Burn him! He'll scream and smell like bacon.
TorturedAdventurer_AD_CustomAssault_5.context: NodeContext: They are cheering the player on - they don't need the prisoner anymore and want to see him die in the most horrible way possible.
